fish,	eggs	and	meat	(for	information	on	peanuts	
see page 34). These foods are also good 
sources of essential vitamins and minerals. 
Eat moderate amounts each day. Choose lean 
meat, remove the skin from poultry and cook 
using only a little fat. You should try to limit the 
amount of red meat or processed meat (for 
example sausages, bacon, cured meats) to no 
more than 90g per day. Make sure poultry, pork, 
burgers and sausages are cooked all the way 
through. Check th
